courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and basic melodies.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: A step-by-step guide to playing the piano, reading sheet music, and understanding music theory.

courses.title: Advanced Music Production
courses.description: Master music production techniques, DAW software, mixing, and mastering for professional music production.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Techniques
courses.description: Explore the art of jazz improvisation, scales, and harmonies to enhance your playing style.

courses.title: Vocal Training & Singing Masterclass
courses.description: Learn professional singing techniques, voice control, breathwork, and performance skills.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Produce electronic music using Ableton Live, covering beat-making, synthesis, and sound design.

courses.title: Classical Violin Techniques
courses.description: Refine your violin skills with advanced bowing techniques, vibrato, and performance strategies.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the basics of music theory, including scales, chords, harmony, and notation.

courses.title: Drumming Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn essential drumming techniques, rhythms, and beats for various music genres.

courses.title: Film Scoring and Composition
courses.description: Learn to compose music for films, create emotional soundscapes, and work with orchestration.
